data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Montagna, Matteo (2011): Pachybrachis sassii, a new species from the Mediterranean Giglio Island (Italy) (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Cryptocephalinae). ZooKeys 155: 51-60, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.155.1951, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.155.1951
